name: Isaac Vandermeulen
text: Despite a fairly long line, the pizza was ready quickly. I was happy to be able to add pineapple to my pizza. Good place if you want a quick cheap pizza

name: Sandra Patlan
text: I think the pizza here is pretty good. It's kinda like a subway but for pizza, you get to customize your pizza but they also have signature pizzas that are ready to order. I ordered two pizzas,4 drinks, and a ceasar salad, the total came to ‚Ä¶More

text: The staff here are lovely! They really take their time and craft your personalized pizza the way you want it! Takes a lot of patience. Thank you for making the experience so enjoyable.

name: Mike Lopez
text: AWESOME customer service, AWESOME pizza! Thanks for everything! Great service!

name: Norman Leon
text: Blaze Pizza blew me away with its friendly staff and excellent pizza ingrediants. Build your own or try their signature pizzas. Its all good! üòé I looked them up and they're in Michigan too. Better than California Pizza Kitchen they're blazing a trail to new way of enjoying America's favorite 'sin food'. üòà

text: Build yourself a custom pizza! I love this place. Didt like the keto crust but that's just me

name: Sonny
text: Picked up a couple of large pizzas (Pep and Chicken/arugula)and they were surprisingly good.  A little thicker than the regular pies but just as good.

name: Vishaal Buch
text: Blaze is fast, fresh and tasty! It is a nice change of pace compared to the long term nor als like Dominoes or Papa John's. A little pricier and a bit smaller in size, but worth it!

name: Michael Flynn
text: This blaze location is amazing! Wonderful food and even better service. I received a wrong postmates order and they went above and beyond for me the next day! Thank you for the service and hope you guys stay safe

name: Boone Howell
text: At the first moment  you arrive in that restaurant  the personel give you a good feeling. Very comfortable waiters, it is a happy place to  pass time with friends or with your date. delicious  meals, specialist  chef, competitive  price and generous  service. Warmly recommended.

name: Linn Hummel
text: The headquarters location is still the best! Best service! Friendly. Fun. And it doesn't hurt that the pizza is yummy too!‚ò∫

name: Tony Rascon
text: Good food and great service. Employees are helpful when you are deciding which pizza you want to get.

name: Annette O
text: I'm in town for business reasons and walked from my hotel to Blaze (which turned out to be 1.1mi) but it was so so worth the exercise walk it turned out to be. I ordered the veggie out pizza on gluten free crust and added additional ‚Ä¶More

name: Mike Trepp
text: Tried curbside pickup for the first time.  Upon arriving, I called the number as instructed and have them my name and was told they'd be right out. After 10 minutes I called again with no answer. Went inside and my order was sitting there. Probably won't use curbside again.

name: Adrian Casey
text: Build your own delicious pizza without a doubt!

name: Tom Bodell
text: Took all my willpower to only go once while in Pasadena. Watch your pizza come to life in front of you with your spec. and then have it served within 10 minutes. Super quick, super food and super value. Get garlic knots too!

name: TJ Joubert
text: Great crust with all the trimmings you want when you "build your own"! Tastes great!

name: Charles Carroll
text: Thin crust, freshly made pizza that can feed 2, if you're just looking for a snack. I stopped in with a friend after a movie, and it was just what we needed to hold us over till the next meal. A friendly welcome started our visit with a smile. üòä

name: Nalan Demir
text: The pride of E Colorado Blvd is this pizzeria!  if you want to eat clean and delicious pizza, address 667 E Colorado!

name: photosbyisaac1
text: Love this place I clean their hoods every 3 months

text: I loved this place. It's clean, comfortable. Nice prices   not to expensive. They have every kind of chair's for your comfort.

name: Richard Potter
text: Great pizza. Fast service

name: Jagannadh Kumar

name: Tony Yeung
text: Surprisingly good and everyone in the store is very customer focus and friendly. Great job on management and of course good pizza help too.

name: Dominik Peric
text: The workers were really nice and friendly. I learned a little about cooking pizza in the big ovens. The food was great! Also, the area is super nice to walk around and maybe grab dessert. Enjoy!

name: Amit Patel
text: Great pie made fresh every single time. And now a large 14 inch pie to get for delivery is better then all the rest of the delivery pizza guys

text: Very good pizza at a reasonable price. I prefer 800 degrees because of the crust and topping quality, but most of my friends like blaze better... But I think it's mostly because of the unlimited toppings at blaze... But too many toppings can ruin a pizza.

name: Ryan Hudson

text: I would say the pizza is very good and the service is friendly and quick. I removed 1 star because they used to let me add spinach to the "white top" pizza for free and then all of a sudden started charging an extra dollar because apparently that makes it a "build your own."

name: Mystic woods
text: This Blaze has caused me and my family some  problems. Every time we order, something is wrong, especially with the Fast Fired Order ahead system. When you order ahead, you want something quick and easy, which this blaze has never been.

name: Robert Marcotte

text: This is a great Blaze pizza. Personally, I like Blaze more than Pieology. Parking is pretty good considering it is on Colorado Blvd. I've never had a problem finding a spot on the street.

text: Had a great experience here at Blaze for my first time there a week ago. Staff was super friendly, and the food is quite good.
